headline: Business briefs: Local manufacturing forum, USDA extension, In-Demand Jobs Week
author: Mansfield News Journal

USDA extends application deadline for Meat and Poultry Processing Expansion Program funding
WASHINGTON — U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) is extending to May 11 the application deadline for the Meat and Poultry Processing Expansion Program (MPPEP), which provides funding to expand meat and poultry processing capacity.

Manufacturing forum to be held April 29
The Regional Manufacturing Coalition (RMC), representing Ashland, Crawford, Huron, Knox and Richland counties, will host a manufacturing forum April 29 at the Gorman Rupp Training Center.
